languages.text: Эта статуя посвящена мученику Джоллусу Маркетту, обратившему более дюжины миров во владениях династии Винтерскейл в Имперское кредо. Его тело, застывшее в немой молитве и пронзенное дюжиной черных клинков, было обнаружено его последователями в его каюте на пути к очередному миру.

traits.locale_text: Эта статуя посвящена Святому Дамиану — после его гибели мощи святого были добавлены в золотой сплав, из которого позже выковали огромную золотую аквилу для корабля "Полифемус".

languages.text: This statue is dedicated to the martyr Jollus Marquette, who converted more than a dozen worlds in the possession of the Winterscale dynasty to the Imperial Creed. His body, frozen in mute prayer and pierced by a dozen black blades, was discovered by his followers in his quarters en route to yet another world.
languages.original_text: Эта статуя посвящена мученику Джоллусу Маркетту, обратившему более дюжины миров во владениях династии Винтерскейл в Имперское кредо. Его тело, застывшее в немой молитве и пронзенное дюжиной черных клинков, было обнаружено его последователями в его каюте на пути к очередному миру.

traits.locale_text: This statue is dedicated to the martyr Jollus Marquette, who converted more than a dozen worlds in the possession of the Winterscale dynasty to the Imperial Creed. His body, frozen in mute prayer and pierced by a dozen black blades, was discovered by his followers in his quarters en route to yet another world.
This is a statue of Saint Damgard, after whose death the bones of the saint were added into the gold alloy that was later used to forge a colossal golden Aquila for the ship Polyphemus.

This statue is dedicated to the martyr Jollus Marquette, who converted more than a dozen worlds in the possession of the Winterscale dynasty to the Imperial Creed. His body, frozen in mute prayer and pierced by a dozen black blades, was discovered by his followers in his quarters en route to yet another world.
This is a statue of Saint Damiane — after his death, the saint's remains were cast in gold alloy and later forged into a colossal golden Aquila for the ship Polyphemus.

This statue is dedicated to the martyr Jollus Marquette, who converted more than a dozen worlds in the possession of the Winterscale dynasty to the Imperial Creed. His body, frozen in mute prayer and pierced by a dozen black blades, was discovered by his followers in his quarters en route to yet another world.
This is a statue of Saint Damgard — after his death, the saint's remains were cast in gold alloy and later forged into a colossal golden Aquila to adorn a voidship.

This statue is dedicated to the martyr Jollus Marquette, who converted more than a dozen worlds in the possession of the Winterscale dynasty to the Imperial Creed. His body, frozen in mute prayer and pierced by a dozen black blades, was discovered by his followers in his quarters en route to yet another world.

languages.text: Diese Statue ist dem Märtyrer Jollus Marquette gewidmet, der mehr als ein Dutzend Welten im Besitz der Winterzunder-Dynastie zum Imperialen Glauben bekehrte. Sein in stillem Gebet erstarrter und von einem Dutzend schwarzer Klingen durchbohrter Körper wurde von seinen Gefolgsleuten in seinem Quartier auf der Reise in eine neue Welt entdeckt.
languages.original_text: This statue is dedicated to the martyr Jollus Marquette, who converted more than a dozen worlds in the possession of the Winterscale dynasty to the Imperial Creed. His body, frozen in mute prayer and pierced by a dozen black blades, was discovered by his followers in his quarters en route to yet another world.

traits.locale_text: Das ist eine Statue des Hl. Damiane – nach seinem Tod wurden die Überreste des Heiligen in eine Goldlegierung gelegt und später zu einem riesigen goldenen Adler für das Schiff Polyphemus gegossen.

languages.text: Cette statue est dédiée au martyr Jollus Marquette, célèbre pour avoir converti au Credo Impérial plus d'une dizaine de mondes sous domination de la dynastie Winterscale. Son corps, figé en une prière muette et transpercé d'une dizaine de lames noires, a été découvert dans ses quartiers par ses disciples alors qu'il faisait route vers une autre planète.
languages.original_text: This statue is dedicated to the martyr Jollus Marquette, who converted more than a dozen worlds in the possession of the Winterscale dynasty to the Imperial Creed. His body, frozen in mute prayer and pierced by a dozen black blades, was discovered by his followers in his quarters en route to yet another world.

traits.locale_text: Une statue de Saint Damiane. Après sa mort, ses cendres furent dispersées dans un alliage d'or qui servit à forger un gigantesque Aquila destiné au vaisseau Polyphemus.

languages.text: 这座雕像用来纪念殉道者乔勒斯·马奎特，他让温特斯凯尔王朝麾下的数十个世界重归帝国信仰之下。前往某个世界的途中，他的追随者在他的船舱里发现了他的尸体，尸体保持着无声的祈祷姿势，被十几把黑色的利刃刺穿。
languages.original_text: This statue is dedicated to the martyr Jollus Marquette, who converted more than a dozen worlds in the possession of the Winterscale dynasty to the Imperial Creed. His body, frozen in mute prayer and pierced by a dozen black blades, was discovered by his followers in his quarters en route to yet another world.

traits.locale_text: 这是圣达米安的雕像。圣达米安死后，他的遗体被包裹在了黄金合金中，之后又被锻造成巨大的黄金双头鹰雕像，安置在‘波吕斐摩斯号’虚空舰上。

languages.text: この彫像は、ウィンタースケール王朝が所有する10以上の世界を帝国信条集に改宗させた殉教者ジョルス・マルケットに捧げられたものだ。彼の遺体は、無言の祈りの中で凍りつき、たくさんの黒い刃に貫かれている。その姿は他の惑星へ向かう途中の宿舎で信徒によって発見された。
languages.original_text: This statue is dedicated to the martyr Jollus Marquette, who converted more than a dozen worlds in the possession of the Winterscale dynasty to the Imperial Creed. His body, frozen in mute prayer and pierced by a dozen black blades, was discovered by his followers in his quarters en route to yet another world.

traits.locale_text: 聖ダミアンの像だーー彼の死後、遺骸は金合金で鋳造され、後にポリフェムスの巨大な黄金のアクィラになった。

languages.text: Esta estatua está dedicada al mártir Jollus Marquette, que convirtió más de una docena de mundos de la dinastía Winterscale al Credo imperial. Su cuerpo, inmovilizado en muda adoración y empalado por doce hojas negras, fue encontrado por sus seguidores en sus aposentos durante el viaje a otro mundo.
languages.original_text: This statue is dedicated to the martyr Jollus Marquette, who converted more than a dozen worlds in the possession of the Winterscale dynasty to the Imperial Creed. His body, frozen in mute prayer and pierced by a dozen black blades, was discovered by his followers in his quarters en route to yet another world.

traits.locale_text: Una estatua de la santa Damiane. Después de su muerte, fundieron los restos de la santa en una aleación de oro para luego forjarlos en una colosal Aquila dorada para la nave Polyphemus.

languages.text: Winterscale hanedanlığının egemenliğindeki yarım düzineden fazla dünyayı İmparatorluk İtikatı'nın yoluna getirmiş şehit Jollus Marquette'e adanmış bir heykel. Sessiz bir duayla donup kalmış ve bir düzine kara bıçak saplanmış cansız bedeni, yeni bir dünyaya daha doğru sefer hazırlığındayken müritlerince odasında bulunmuştur.
languages.original_text: This statue is dedicated to the martyr Jollus Marquette, who converted more than a dozen worlds in the possession of the Winterscale dynasty to the Imperial Creed. His body, frozen in mute prayer and pierced by a dozen black blades, was discovered by his followers in his quarters en route to yet another world.

traits.locale_text: Winterscale hanedanlığının egemenliğindeki yarım düzineden fazla dünyayı İmparatorluk İtikatı'nın yoluna getirmiş şehit Jollus Marquette'e adanmış bir heykel. Sessiz bir duayla donup kalmış ve bir düzine kara bıçak saplanmış cansız bedeni, yeni bir dünyaya daha doğru sefer hazırlığındayken müritlerince odasında bulunmuştur.
